about_the_game:
How lucky you are!🍀

You start college in Tokyo and your dear uncle lends you the house he has nearby.

Arriving at your new residence, you make a small route inside until you find the room that is going to be yours.

You approach a cardboard box which has a note signed by your uncle: “This camera has the power to irretrievably attach you to the person you take a picture of. It is loaded with 4 shots. Use it with care and don't be too naughty.”

Your first expression is to roll your eyes and laugh at such nonsense. However, after setting up all your stuff and realizing that the female residence is in front of the house, you decide to give it a try.

The camera's zoom gives you views that make you gulp. Without a second thought, you shoot, capturing the image of a girl.

You decide to lie down without giving it much thought, not knowing that you're going to cross paths with the girls in the dorm:

📸 Aimi is affectionate, giggly and sociable. She has an innate ability to lift the spirits of those around her, although she will lift you more than that.

She wants to show you her favorite corners full of magic; a beautiful forest, an enchanting park, even her juicy, wet lower lips.

📸 Rina is curious, playful and mischievous. She loves to have fun, she is always looking for new experiences and fun. Your crotch may be her new entertainment.

Her attitude is carefree and at times she can be a bit naive. It wouldn't be unusual for you to end up fucking without knowing it.

📸 Naoko is... tsundere, reserved and hard to impress. Although she may seem cold or aloof, if you capture her with your camera, you'll have her warm and she'll want to have you inside her.

She values discipline and tradition. Underneath her rigid exterior and clothing, she hides a vulnerability that you are going to be able to meet and gently feel.

📸 Akari is flirtatious, outgoing and likes to be the center of attention. She has a natural charm that you are going to be attracted to her with, but you have another ace up your sleeve to turn that situation around.

She is very confident and persuasive. She's going to convince you how to fuck you without even realizing it.

📸 Haruki is reserved and mysterious, with a presence that captivates without the need to speak much. When she’s close, you won’t miss her using her mouth (or maybe you will).

She’s observant, sharp, and carries an air of mystery around her… You can’t quite tell if it’s possible to connect with her, though you’d love for there to be a hint of interest for you within her.

  • Visual Novel++ Format: Each girl has different arcs that complete her own story.

  • Enhanced experience with your feedback: We’ve tripled the length of the game compared to the previous one and added images with more aspect ratios.

  • No Censorship!: We’ve removed censorship from the images (an option to customize censorship will be added later).

  • New mechanics - Photo puzzles: Swap image blocks to restore the full picture.

  • Choose the girl: Decide which girl’s story you want to progress through the game.

  • Flashback: Go back in the story at any time if you want to change a decision or relive a moment.

  • Comfortable navigation: Choose whether you want the text to progress automatically or skip it to get to your favorite part.

  • Immersive audio: Including music, sound effects, voices, and "other effects." Adjust the volume independently or mute everything as you prefer.

PLEASE NOTE.

  • All characters depicted and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no real or identifiable minors have been used in the production of this game.

  • Give us a hand! If you think you can improve the narrative in your language, feel free to send us your suggestions to our mail or by message on our Steam page.

  • We are still working: all the improvements and new features we develop will be added to the game at no additional cost.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity and sexual acts graphic content.
-Not suitable for watching at work.
-Not suitable for all ages.
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

name: SpyLens: Sex in focus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN XP/Vista/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card

short_description: You never thought that in your hands you would end up with the camera that creates the desire and the need to want to sleep with you; just by taking a picture of her or them. How far do you want to go with your new toy?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Japanese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
